item.title: -508- simple error? *berky scape source* ANYONE?!
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

umm yea i was making a thing cuz on becky scape when u exchange logs to the wc tutor it gives u money, well i added the freaky forester and u exchange magic logs and it gives u money well here’s the codes i did.

First this is the one becky already had for woodcut tutor.

if(pnp.npcType == 4906) { if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 1511, 1) == true) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 500); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,1511, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 1511), 1); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 4906, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Woodcutting Tutor", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Thank you for the logs!", 241, 4); }
Here’s the one i put for freaky forester…

if(pnp.npcType == 2458) { if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 1513, 1) == true) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,1511, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 1511), 1); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 4906, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Freaky Forester", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Thx! Need to level my fletching!", 241, 4); }

and i got this 1 error…

.\Bulby\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:1088: reached end of file while parsing
}
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
